entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
